Uses of Class
gamelogic.Maze

    • Uses of Maze in gamelogic

      Methods in gamelogic that return Maze 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Maze Game.getMaze()
      Returns the maze of the game.
      Methods in gamelogic with parameters of type Maze 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Dragon.dies(Maze maze)
      Signals the dragon has died and removes it from the maze.
      void Dragon.fallAsleep(Maze maze)
      Signals the dragon to fall asleep and changes its symbol accordingly.
      int Dragon.mode(Maze maze)
      Returns 0 or 1 randomly.
      void Dragon.move(Maze maze)
      Moves the dragon within the maze.
      boolean Hero.move(java.lang.String key, Maze maze)
      Moves the hero within the maze.
      boolean Hero.pickUpSword(Maze.Sword sword, Maze maze)
      Makes the hero pick up the sword
      void Game.setMaze(Maze maze)
      Sets the maze of the game.
      void Dragon.setPosition(int x, int y, Maze maze)
      Sets the position of the dragon on the maze grid and places it on the maze.
      void Dragon.wakeUp(Maze maze)
      Signals the dragon to wake up and changes its symbol accordingly.
      Constructors in gamelogic with parameters of type Maze 
      Constructor and Description
      Dragon(Maze maze)
      Creates a dragon with random coordinates and places it on the given maze.
      Hero(Maze maze)
      Creates a hero with random coordinates and places it on the given maze.
